name: Abaddon (2000)
description:
The setting is the far future. Years after an apocalypse the few survivors find refuge in a citadel from the dreadful beast they know as Abaddon.

Each area is ruled by a member of the houses. The houses are the people who escaped the great apocalypse in ages past. As the decades march by each area starts to develop its culture. They forget about the world they left.
